column6: calculated using OpenStreetMap data in same footprint as [Nordbo et al. (2015)](10.1016/j.uclim.2015.05.004)

derived from 0.44 frontal area index reported in [Nordbo et al. 2013](https://doi.org/10.1007/s10546-012-9773-y) and Eq. 7 & 8 in [Porson et al. 2010](https://doi.org/10.1002/qj.668)
derived from 0.44 frontal area index reported in [Nordbo et al. 2013](https://doi.org/10.1007/s10546-012-9773-y) and Eq. 1 in [Masson et al. 2020](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.uclim.2019.100536)
derived from morphology using eq. 26 of [Macdonald et al. (1998)](https://doi.org/10.1016/S1352-2310(97)00403-2)
